item.title: Undergraduate
item.description: Admissions Please visit the offical admissions for undergraduates course Courses ATM1001 Global Environment and Atmospheric Sciences Scientific understanding of global environmental problems such as global warming, destruction of the ozone layer, air pollution, desertification, El Nino/ La Nino severe weather, etc. and related research areas and methodologies in atmospheric sciences. ATM2101 Climate and Global Change Understanding global-scale changes such as global warming, destruction of the ozone layer, desertification in terms of climate system including the atmosphere, oceans and terrestrial ecosystems.
